actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to extend the benefits of the Act  to certain handicapped adults.

summary.text: Amends the National School Lunch Act to define "child" as a person: (1) under 21 years of age in a qualified school; or (2) 21 or older who is mentally or physically handicapped and participating in a school program established for the mentally or physically handicapped.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to extend the benefits of the Act  to certain handicapped adults.
